actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to permit loans to be made to certain small business concerns that have suffered or will suffer substantial economic injury as a result of the diminished availability of refined petroleum products.

summary.text: Empowers the Small Business Administration to make loans, directly or in cooperation with lending institutions, to assist small businesses, with annual sales under $20,000,000 in the businesss of retail petroleum sales or sales to tourists, who are adversely affected by the energy crisis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to permit loans to be made to certain small business concerns that have suffered or will suffer substantial economic injury as a result of the diminished availability of refined petroleum products.
